title: Lesson 51
paragraph: Systems and reform involve structured changes to improve efficiency and fairness. Equalizing, constraining, and centralizing processes can enhance functionality across organizations.

words.example: She attends regular meetings every week.
Policies were introduced to equalityize opportunities.

words.example: The rights of the minority were protected.

words.example: The motor powers the conveyor belt.

words.meaning: the state of being central or important
words.example: The centrality of education in society is evident.
